description:
If you have a new pool or a new pool interior - then this course could save you thousands of dollars!!

The information contained within this course will ensure that your pool will be in brilliant condition for years to come!

You don't need any specific training, you certainly don't need to hire a pool professional, all you need to do is follow a few simple steps.


In this course you will Learn:

* The Importance of Balanced Water

* How to Balance Water

* What is PH and Why is it Important?

* What is Total Alkalinity?

* The Importance of Calcium Prevention and How to Prevent it

* The Start Up Procedure in very easy to follow steps

* The All Important Do's and Dont's

* Why should we Add Salt?

* Why do we Need to Brush the Walls of the Pool?

* What to Do and When

Everything you need to know about looking after your new pool is contained right here!

If you Love your Pool and want to have it for many, many more years to come, then jump into this course!
title: Pool Care 101
